author: Joseph Young
title: U.S. Futures Plunge as Eurozone Fails Crucial Coronavirus Stimulus
description: The U.S. stock market futures reversed from an initial 1.3% gain to a sharp loss as the euro zone failed to achieve a deal on a stimulus deal. The post U.S. Futures Plunge as Eurozone Fails Crucial Coronavirus Stimulus appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The eurozone failed to finalize a massive stimulus deal to lift the stock market.
  • It applies further pressure on small businesses as major European economies free fall into recession.
  • U.S. stock market is at risk of a further downtrend… [+3628 chars]
